description:
Slope Wallet
Slope is a mobile cryptocurrency wallet and browser extension that enables you to safely manage assets on the Solana blockchain.
In addition to sending and receiving funds, Slope also allows you to securely connect and interact with decentralized applications (Dapps) on the Solana blockchain and other chains.
keywords: Eth加密貨幣投資平台區塊鏈虛擬貨幣行情股票交易所派網期貨火币中币安钱包trading財經外匯Eth,binance,metamask,solana,slope,phantom,wallet
promotionalText: Slope Wallet is a Solana-based non-custodial crypto wallet, including the features of send and receive, NFT, swap and cross-chain to Ethereum.
whatsNew:
Added staking feature.
Optimized UI.
Fixed some minor bugs.
